sentences.english: The interior of a Leather Tanner's workshop can make strong men retch.
sentences.chinese: 製革工坊內部的惡臭令壯漢亦不禁窒息。

sentences.english: They were also very dirty and their hair smelled even after four washings, the report said.
sentences.chinese: 兩人身上很髒，頭髮洗了四次仍散發着惡臭。

sentences.english: This putrid body disintegrates; life, indeed, ends in death.
sentences.chinese: 當這惡臭的污穢體分解時，生命真的結束於死亡。

sentences.english: Existing odorous gas treatment processes research.
sentences.chinese: 常用惡臭氣體處理技術研究。

sentences.english: Captain yolles wrinkled his nose at the overpowering odor of garbage .
sentences.chinese: 聞到一股垃圾的惡臭，約里斯處長皺了皺鼻子。

sentences.english: The stench of the old rain water in the shade the never seemed to evaporate.
sentences.chinese: 陰暗處的惡臭的積水，像是永遠也不會蒸發。

sentences.english: A fetid odor seeps from the walls, the odor of a mildewed mattress.
sentences.chinese: 牆裏滲出一股惡臭味，那是發黴的牀墊味。

sentences.english: The fetid open drains lining the main street of the town do not smell eco-friendly;
sentences.chinese: 鎮上的水渠散發着惡臭，聞起來似乎並不環境友好。

sentences.english: Make sure to toss out any malodorous items that might be causing the bad smell.
sentences.chinese: 不過首先除去冰箱裏面所有散發惡臭的變質食品。

sentences.english: The barn smelled so bad that she held her nose.
sentences.chinese: 牲口棚惡臭難聞，她捏住了鼻子。

sentences.english: Whatever else is unsure in this stinking dunghill of a world a mother's love is not.
sentences.chinese: 母親之愛絕非是惡臭糞坑般的世界所無法確定的東西。

sentences.english: Basically, low concentration of alkane background gas has no effect on the removal efficiency of malodorous gas. ?
sentences.chinese: 低濃度的烷烴背景氣體對惡臭的脫除效率基本無影響。

sentences.english: But sometimes the stench is just too much. It'll make you light-headed.
sentences.chinese: 但是有時候那惡臭簡直能把你臭暈。

sentences.english: Into the starless night, I follow the stench.
sentences.chinese: 進入星光的夜晚，我遵循的惡臭。

sentences.english: Perfume from battle-fields rising, up from the foetor arising.
sentences.chinese: 醇香飄自這戰場，惡臭泛起沿着河上。

sentences.english: The pond stank like a sewer.
sentences.chinese: 池塘像陰溝一樣散發着惡臭。

definition: lit. windswept and battered by rain/to undergo hardship (idiom)
